column3: School of Psychology and Computer Science
column5: About the courseThe MSc Computing will help you to develop your computing skills in the theory and practice of designing and developing computer systems. On this course you will build on your existing skills and develop new skills in order to prepare yourself for employment in the computing industry. This requires an understanding of programming, systems design and evaluation, project management, creative problem-solving and a range of technical skills. You will also have the opportunity to work on a substantial project of your own choice.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1-2 years full time, up to 3 years part time
